From: "dph of rules " <dph_of_rules@...>

After reinstalling gladiator into a new folder, I started copying the 
save game files.  After I copied save0.gtl, the game refused to run.  
So I deleted the file and added the rest of my save game files and 
presto, the game ran in a different folder.  So I went back to my 
original folder and deleted save0.gtl.  Apparantly that file holds the 
 temporary state of whatever team played last.

I decided to start from stratch and create a new mega-archmage for 
myself and this time, I will not spend money beyond what I spent on 
con, str, dex, int, and armor.  Instead, I will those stats alone and 
just raise the experience level.

By the way, what are the stats [str, con, dex, int, armor] for the 
generic characters placed in the game?  I know mages/archmages must 
have intelligence beyond 75 (even level 1 enemy mages can leave a 
teleport marker).
